# [Interview #986: Hal-Con Report - Lance Alvein, Entry #16](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=986#16)

#### Lance Alvein

Is a person's Breath the entirety of that person's Spiritual Aspect?

#### BRANDON SANDERSON (paraphrased)

No
